text: Anɨb ak yad Pol, Klays Jisas takaw ne ak agñɨ ajen, yɨp nag lel mɨdebin ak, nep agɨnɨm tek yɨp gos nɨŋɨd gɨnɨmɨn. Klays bɨne mɨdebin tek, nep takaw kɨles agɨnɨg apɨnep ak pen, nep anɨb ma agɨnɨm agɨl kelɨgɨpin. Chɨl penpen mapen lɨpul anɨb ak tek, yad bɨ mɨlep mɨdebin ak, yad nep takaw saynsayn agɨl agnɨgɨnɨm.
